Added_Other.name: FFlagAccountLockConsoleLogout_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Implements a feature to log out users from consoles when their account is locked.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances account security by ensuring locked accounts cannot be accessed on consoles.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableAccountLockModal_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Introduces a modal window for account locking features.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances account security by prompting users to lock their accounts.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableBiometricChallenges_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Introduces biometric authentication for certain actions.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances security by allowing players to use fingerprints or face recognition.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableChallengeRateLimit_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Limits the number of challenges a player can attempt in a given time frame.
Added_Other.purpose: Prevents players from spamming challenges, ensuring fair play and a better gaming experience.

Added_Other.name: FFlagEnableNativeChallengeAbandonment_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Allows players to abandon challenges more easily within the game.
Added_Other.purpose: Provides players with more flexibility and reduces frustration when facing difficult challenges.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPersonaLivenessFocusNavigation_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Improves navigation focus on player profiles in the UI.
Added_Other.purpose: Makes it easier for players to interact with and view profiles.
